summary: Command‑line utility that assembles configuration, initializes the training environment, prepares data loaders, sets up optimization, optionally restores pretrained weights, and launches self‑supervised speech representation pre‑training using NeMo's SpeechEncDecSelfSupervisedModel.
business_intent: Provide a ready‑to‑run example for building robust speech models through self‑supervised pre‑training, which can later be fine‑tuned on labeled data to improve automatic speech recognition performance.
